Hot Gadget #3: The Philips AirFryer

The Philips AirFryer gives a delightful air-fried alternative versus the oil-fried standard version. It utilizes a patented Fast Air technology that reduces the body fat by up to 80%. It's a healthier choice to put together some of your preferred fried foods and snacks. The integrated air filter keeps your kitchen smelling so fresh and so clean. The AirFryer has an adjustable temperature control and a temperature light, so that you can get the benefits that you want. It has a built-in timer that emits a bell-sound to allow you know that your meals is accomplished. No a lot more burnt meals. It contains an inspiring recipe booklet that consists of 30 recipes along with lots of points and tricks. It's called The Coffee two. considering that is the next generation coffee maker that will brew your coffee per your voice commands. The technologies is similar to the voice activation software package on your mobile mobile phone. You just press the button, and then wait for the verbal prompt for the preprogrammed inquiries. It has some revolutionary solutions such as verbally setting the time or just demanding a pot of hot coffee. The important characteristics of this coffee maker are its 12 cup capability, dishwasher secure carafe and the removable filter basket. It also capabilities a two hour automated shutoff and a pause and serve.

Soak the chips for at least half an hour beforehand to get rid of most of the starch. Dry them as thoroughly as you can, pour up to one particular tablespoon of oil more than the chips and use your hands to coat the chips evenly. Even while the over is the suggested way to prepare your chips, do not get too stressed about them being specifically equally sized, soaking them for precisely half an hour or getting perfectly dry, you will still get amazing chips as extended as you make some effort.

Though a number of people say that these chips are just like the deep fried edition, I have not found that to be rather the scenario. Yes, they are fluffy inside and look very very similar, but they are not fairly as crispy. They are nonetheless tasty and by far the best choice to the deep fried wide variety. The taste is a terrific improvement on the cardboard tasting very low extra fat oven chips we have all suffered for years!

Each the machines pointed out right here cook chips that taste the exact. The only variation is that with the Tefal Actifry, you can hold an eye on how they are accomplishing through the clear lid, and do not will need to do anything at all right up until they are cooked. With the Philips Air Fryer, you set the timer and give the basket a shake half way by way of the cooking time. You will also require to pull the basket out to examine on them near the end. Not a dilemma, but something you may want to keep in thoughts. The two machines clean quite easily and most parts can go in the dishwasher.

If you feel the only item you can cook in these machines are chips so they are not price successful, then you are incorrect. You can cook at outstanding offer of recipes in them it just requires a little bit of adaptation. Both machines come with their personal collection of recipes and there are recipe books slowly coming onto the marketplace. It has a created-in timer that emits a bell-sound to let you know that your food is executed. No even more burnt meals. It incorporates an inspiring recipe booklet that is made up of 30 recipes along with a large number of tips and tricks. It has a meals separator attachment, so you can cook chicken wings in one particular container and fries in the other container what a time-saver. Getting dishwasher protected is always an straightforward solution just toss it in the dishwasher, cleanup is hassle-free.

philips airfryer review

The Philips air fryer is a great kitchen appliance that any home would benefit by having. It offers a healthier alternative to the traditionally deep fried food. When you use this product, you’re ensuring that your family lives a healthier lifestyle and there’s no more a need to go on diets; because, there are times when you reduce up to 80% fat content in the food when cooked using the air fryer.
Cooking with the air fryer has been made really easy, because it’s got with it a good combination of features and easy to handle controls.
Temperature Control – No matter what you want to cook, whether it’s Philips airfryer recipes or your very own cuisine, you’re going to need to control the temperature. This air fryer has a high quality thermostat to do just that.
Let’s take a look at a few Philips airfryer Recipes:
Everyone’s favorite – Fries!
Who doesn’t love fries? But, thanks to their high oil content we stay away from them. However, after the invention of the #air fryer#, we don’t need to torture ourselves anymore!
What you need:
· 2 – 3 medium sized Potatoes
· Just a single tablespoon of oil – Whatever you usually use (Sunflower oil would be preferred)
· Chilly Flakes
· Salt to taste (Add a bit of pepper too if you wish)
Method of preparation
1. Peel the potatoes well and chop them into decent sizes – You know, usual fry size
2. Sprinkle salt, pepper and your chilly flakes in addition to any other spices that you fancy and mix them up well. Shake and don’t stir – you don’t want to break the pieces
3. Now place them in the tray or basket of your Philips Airfryer, and apply a bit of oil.
4. Keep them in the fryer at around 180 degrees for 10 – 15 minutes and that’s it! You’ve got a batch of French Fries ready to be hogged.
Grilled Fish and Other Non-Veg dishes
Let’s use grilled fish as an example as it’s the hardest Philips airfryer recipe that comes to mind.
What you’re going to need
· Fish – Any fish of your choice
· Salt, turmeric powder and chilly powder
· Any other spices that you usually use.
Method of Preparation:
Getting the fish ready to place into the fryer is really easy and you wouldn’t find it hard at all – basically you just need to do the same as you’d do when preparing it on your gas stove.
1. Clean the fish of its intestines and other stuff – pat it dry
2. Marinate the fish for around 30 – 40 minutes so that the spices have time to seep in
3. Now you need to arrange the fish in the basket so that there’s a bit of gap between each.
4. Air Fry the fish for 5 minutes at around 180 degrees then at 200 degrees for another 8 minutes
5. Serve hot and enjoy with your favorite sauces.
Once you get the hang of it, you could come up with your very own recipes that are made specifically for the #philips air fryer# – So enjoy cooking delicacies and eating them too.
 

philips airfryer review, philips airfryer review

Hot Gadget #three: The Philips AirFryer

For all you french fry or fried chicken lovers, here's a hot kitchen gadget that the entire family is sure to enjoy. The Philips AirFryer provides a delightful air-fried possibility versus the oil-fried traditional edition. It utilizes a patented Fast Air technological innovation that decreases the extra fat by up to 80%.

philips airfryer review

The viva collection airfryer is similar in every aspect other than the color with the popular hd9220 airfryer. The air fryer is definitely an amazing revolution in the cooking industry – home cooking has never been healthier.
Using the fryer you could cook traditional deep fried food in a simple, yet fast and healthy manner. Therefore, there’s no need of you to possess a deep fry pan in your kitchen – all you need is the viva collecyion airfryer.
Oh! It’s not just the deep fryer that it replaces; there’s no more the need of an oven; as, cakes too can be easily baked in less than half an hour – faster than most ovens. But, how does this masterpiece actually work? Let’s just take a glimpse.
Working of the Air Fryer from Philips
What makes the# viva collection airfryer# special? There’s a secret here that no other company possesses. The viva airfryer works on patented Rapid air technology so as to give you fast results as well as delicious taste.
This technology combines a grill and the fast circulation of hot air to give you crisp brown tinted food containing about 80% less fat than fried stuff. What makes it all the more special is the fact that it’s an all-rounder capable of preparing anything right from chips, fries, chicken nuggets, steak as well as cakes.
Controlling and cleaning
What good is an appliance that you can’t control with ease? That’s the reason the makers of the viva collection airfeyer have seen to it that the functioning of this marvel is as simple as possible. There’s a control using which you can easily set the temperature to the desired level – anywhere between the range of 80 degrees to 200 degrees Celsius.
In addition to superior controls, the Philips airfryer healthier oil free fryer also has a great separator that prevents the mixing of odors, you’re fries don’t need to smell like chicken nuggets even though they’re being cooked at the same time.
Cleaning – Isn’t it what we all hate? However, the manufacturing team has made this task simple as well. Safety is ensured as the wall body cools fast, so you can clean it immediately after use if you wish. Also, it consists of a removable bowl which is dishwasher friendly.
The fryer also includes an odor filter that helps prevent nugget smell throughout your house. Nuggets smell good, but it isn’t the case with other stuff, so this is a great feature all by itself.
Using the air fryer
The #viva collection airfryer# has a detachable tray wherein you place the food. The capacity of the fryer is around 0.8kg which is ideal for home use. If you need to cook more, there’s no problem because each batch is ready within a matter of minutes.
Food needs to be timed and therefore it comes along with a timer as well. So, all you need to do is set the timer and you’re food is ready on its own. No worries of over cooking or should it be over frying?

philips airfryer review

The Philips air fryer is a great kitchen appliance that any home would benefit by having. It offers a healthier alternative to the traditionally deep fried food. When you use this product, you’re ensuring that your family lives a healthier lifestyle and there’s no more a need to go on diets; because, there are times when you reduce up to 80% fat content in the food when cooked using the air fryer.
Cooking with the air fryer has been made really easy, because it’s got with it a good combination of features and easy to handle controls.
Temperature Control – No matter what you want to cook, whether it’s Philips airfryer recipes or your very own cuisine, you’re going to need to control the temperature. This air fryer has a high quality thermostat to do just that.
Let’s take a look at a few Philips airfryer Recipes:
Everyone’s favorite – Fries!
Who doesn’t love fries? But, thanks to their high oil content we stay away from them. However, after the invention of the #air fryer#, we don’t need to torture ourselves anymore!
What you need:
· 2 – 3 medium sized Potatoes
· Just a single tablespoon of oil – Whatever you usually use (Sunflower oil would be preferred)
· Chilly Flakes
· Salt to taste (Add a bit of pepper too if you wish)
Method of preparation
1. Peel the potatoes well and chop them into decent sizes – You know, usual fry size
2. Sprinkle salt, pepper and your chilly flakes in addition to any other spices that you fancy and mix them up well. Shake and don’t stir – you don’t want to break the pieces
3. Now place them in the tray or basket of your Philips Airfryer, and apply a bit of oil.
4. Keep them in the fryer at around 180 degrees for 10 – 15 minutes and that’s it! You’ve got a batch of French Fries ready to be hogged.
Grilled Fish and Other Non-Veg dishes
Let’s use grilled fish as an example as it’s the hardest Philips airfryer recipe that comes to mind.
What you’re going to need
· Fish – Any fish of your choice
· Salt, turmeric powder and chilly powder
· Any other spices that you usually use.
Method of Preparation:
Getting the fish ready to place into the fryer is really easy and you wouldn’t find it hard at all – basically you just need to do the same as you’d do when preparing it on your gas stove.
1. Clean the fish of its intestines and other stuff – pat it dry
2. Marinate the fish for around 30 – 40 minutes so that the spices have time to seep in
3. Now you need to arrange the fish in the basket so that there’s a bit of gap between each.
4. Air Fry the fish for 5 minutes at around 180 degrees then at 200 degrees for another 8 minutes
5. Serve hot and enjoy with your favorite sauces.
Once you get the hang of it, you could come up with your very own recipes that are made specifically for the #philips air fryer# – So enjoy cooking delicacies and eating them too.
